alert.note: Alert for Antelope Valley; Western Antelope Valley Foothills (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Wind Advisory issued January 03 at 1:56AM PST until January 04 at 3:00AM PST by NWS Oxnard
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 3 AM PST THURSDAY... * WHAT...West winds 20 to 35 mph with gusts up to 55 mph. Isolated gusts to 60 mph across the western portion of the valley. * WHERE...Western Antelope Valley Foothills and Antelope Valley. * WHEN...Until 3 AM PST Thursday. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds will blow around unsecured objects and make driving difficult, especially for high profile vehicles. Tree limbs could be blown down and a few power outages may result.
info.instruction: Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects.

area.areaDesc: Antelope Valley; Western Antelope Valley Foothills
